name: Copy the Cat
description:
Oh no, the cat is trapped in the cards! Find the matching card to free it from its spell.

Credit

  • Game Engine: https://www.godotengine.org 
  • Cats: https://seethingswarm.itch.io/catset
  • Tiles: https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-platformer-tiles
  • Various sounds from https://opengameart.org/content/level-up-power-up-coin-get-13-sounds
  • “Can't Stop Winning” Composed by Jonathan Shaw (www.jshaw.co.uk)
